detail_desc: Short dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a small, frill-trimmed stand-up collar, button placket and long sleeves. Frill trims down the front and back, and at the cuffs and hem, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with jersey lining.

Fitted jacket woven in a patterned viscose blend with notch lapels, welt front pockets, a single button at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Shorter, straight-cut top in patterned mesh with beaded embroidery. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, long sleeves with flared cuffs and a small frill at the hem.

Fully lined textured swimsuit with cut-out sections and padded cups with removable inserts. Decorative ties at the bust and, ties at the back and back of the neck. The swimsuit is made partly from recycled fabric.
